column5: Looking for experienced Sysops and BBS users to look at a new java based client/server bbs software. We are looking for Sysops to test the Server software, and BBS users to test the Client software. We are working hard on this project and are releasing new features every week or so. If you would be interested in having a look at this, our website is: http://www.coolfred.com/html/download/pbbsFAQ.html or email us at: [email protected] Thank you.
Get the ##### of this board, talk fishing or get lost!
